Package com.example.project_part_3.Database_functions

Class EventDatabase

java.lang.Object
com.example.project_part_3.Database_functions.EventDatabase
public class EventDatabase extends Object
High-level repository for managing Event data. This class abstracts away the Task-based nature of the low-level Database class, exposing LiveData and simple callbacks for use in ViewModels and UI controllers. NOTE: This is a hybrid class containing legacy singleton logic for backward compatibility. This legacy code should be removed once all dependent activities are refactored.
